amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to require the Director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to issue a quarterly report on debt collection complaints and enforcement actions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Pressley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
